meanings.definition: A category of people or things having common characteristics
meanings.sent1: There are many different types of animals in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: She prefers to read books of all types, from mystery to romance.
meanings.sent3: The party had all types of snacks, from chips to cookies.
meanings.sent4: His music taste is so diverse, he listens to all types of genres.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the different types of clouds using pictures.

meanings.definition: To write with a typewriter or computer
meanings.sent1: She types her essays on the computer to make them neat.
meanings.sent2: He types quickly to finish his work before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked across the keyboard and accidentally types a message.
meanings.sent4: The secretary types up the meeting notes for everyone to review.
meanings.sent5: I need to type up this report before the end of the day.

meanings.definition: To determine the type of something
meanings.sent1: The scientist types the DNA sample to identify the species.
meanings.sent2: They need to type the material to understand its properties.
meanings.sent3: I will type the mystery object to see what it is made of.
meanings.sent4: The detective types the fingerprints to match them to the suspect.
meanings.sent5: She types the code to unlock the secret message.
